name: Sugar Heart and Octavina
description:
OVERVIEW

Here, you play as Noli, a friendless senior high student with minimal self-confidence. When a fox appeared and declared her a magical warrior from a destroyed magic kingdom, she thought it would be a chance to improve her character. However, there are things that still trouble her despite becoming a magical girl...

Sugar Heart and Octavina are both of their respective kingdom's hope. These two magical girls will have to fight each other in order to fulfill a prophecy and bring glory to their kingdom.

~ MAGIC ~

- Image doused in pastel colors, mostly pink

- 2 Endings

- Font: Rainy Hearts

- Music by: Maou Damashii

- Sound Effects from: Visual Monkey, Earth, GamingSoundEffects, MyNameIsZoom, Funny Channel, YT, Sound Effects

Created in 8 days for the Magical Girl Game Jam #6!

Theme: Sweet
